H3.text: who is the leader of north korea today. Kim Jong-un

A4.text: Kim Jong Un rules North Korea as a totalitarian dictatorship

A5.text: Kim Jong Un was promoted to the highest rank of Wonsu (marshal) in the Korean People's Army, consolidating his positions as the commander‑in‑chief of the Korean People's Army and chairman of the Central Military Commission.
